summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2662, for the improvement of West 59th Street from 20th Avenue Northwest to 24th Avenue Northwest, all in the City of Seattle, by resurfacing; constructing wooden curbs and gutters; concrete sidewalks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 31304 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
